mapper.select: select w.wish_seq, w.cust_seq, w.product_seq, p.product_serial, p.product_pay, p.category_seq, p.product_name, p.product_img, p.product_features from wishlist w join product p on w.product_seq = p.product_seq where w.cust_seq = #{cust_seq}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM wishlist where cust_seq = #{cust_seq} and product_seq = #{product_seq};
